item.title: Constrained Latent Action Policies for Model-Based Offline Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Constrained Latent Action Policies (C-LAP) revolutionizes offline reinforcement learning by jointly modeling state-action distributions, implicitly constraining policies to improve efficiency and redu…
